document_data.name: Slater
document_data.mainbody: '''Slater''' was a female [[human]] soldier of the [[Zhentilar]] [[Company of the Scorpions]] during the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR]].{{cite book/Tantras|140-200}}
document_data.History: Slater was one of the first to befriend [[Cyric]] when he decided to join the Scorpions. She helped and followed him loyally. She explained to Cyric that she liked him and his vision of power, and she wanted to rise through the ranks as his lieutenant. When in [[Scardale]], the Company was reorganized as an elite force under the god [[Bane]] himself. Slater was nominated as captain of one of the ships arranged for the assault against [[Tantras]].
